subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets are 42-23, one victory behind but 4 percentage points ahead of Detroit for the best record in baseball. It is not yet summer, and the Mets are playing as if it is fall.
snippet: The Mets are 42-23, one victory behind but 4 percentage points ahead of Detroit for the best record in baseball. It is not yet summer, and the Mets are playing as if it is fall.
